pages.text: Ruto no min mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Doho ruto ga, kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, daredare ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Anata gata wa sozo sa reta mono no naka otoko dake ni chikadzuki
nushi ga anata gata no tame ni tsukura reta haigusha o kaeriminai nodesu ka. Iya, anata gata wa tsumiwookasu-shadesu
Kare-ra wa (kotaete) itta. `Ikagen tomenainara, ruto yo, anata wa kanarazu tsuiho sa rerudeshou
Kare (ruto wa) itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni anata gata no okonai o imikiratte imasu
Omo yo, watashi to watashinokazoku o, kare-ra no shogyo kara o sukui kudasai
Sorede ware wa, kare to kare no kazoku o subete sukutta
Ato ni nokotta, rojo (ruto no tsuma) wa betsudeattaga
Sore kara, ware wa soto no mono o horoboshita
Ware wa,(-seki no) ame o kare-ra no ue ni fura seta. Keikoku sa rete ita-sha-tachi ni wa, saiyaku no amedeatta
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaki jihibukaki okata de ara reru
Mori no hitobito mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Shuaibu ga kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomenai. Watashi e no hoshu wa, ii ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Keiryo o jubun ni atae, son o sa sete wa narimasen
Seikakuna ase de hakari
tanin no mono o sashu shite wa narimasen. Mata meiwaku o oyobosu okonai o shite, chijo o taihai sa sete wa narimasen
